DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose study evaluate reliability usability reusable BrownieForSymphony pump set home use . The primary objective study ass compare System Usability Scale ( SUS ) score BrownieForSymphony pump set current used Symphony pump set . Secondary Objectives The secondary objective study : evaluate rate usability problem BrownieForSymphony pump set - evaluate pragmatic quality ( task/goal fulfilment ) BrownieForSymphony pump set - evaluate perceive comfort pump BrownieForSymphony pump set Prospective Cohort Study ( quasi Cross design )
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Reliability Usability Reusable `` BrownieForSymphony '' Pump Set Home Use
DOC.criteria: Lactating woman > 18 year Have pump least 7 day Symphony pump pump set prior study participation Have pump least 10 time week prior study participation Consistently pump 10 ml milk per breast , per pump session prior study participation Currently use breast shield size 24 mm Participant agree pump least 10 time week next three week Woman medical condition breast ( eg . Mastitis )
